trans-unit.source: A list of flags defined in the re module documentation from the Python standard library. Each list item should be a string that will correlate to the human-friendly flag name. E.g., ['IGNORECASE', 'MULTILINE']. Optionally, flags may be an int, with a value corresponding to the XOR (|) of all the desired flags. Defaults to 8 (which supports 'MULTILINE').
trans-unit.target: Python标准库的 re 模块文档中定义的标志列表。每个列表项都应该是一个与人类友好的标志名称相关的字符串。例如， ['IGNORECASE', 'MULTILINE'] 。可选地， flags 可以是一个int，其值对应于所有期望标志的XOR（ | ）。默认为8（支持“ MULTILINE”）。

trans-unit.source: A list of flags defined in the re module documentation from the Python standard library. Each list item should be a string that will correlate to the human-friendly flag name. E.g., ['IGNORECASE', 'MULTILINE']. Optionally, flags may be an int, with a value corresponding to the XOR (|) of all the desired flags. Defaults to 8 (which equates to ['MULTILINE']).
trans-unit.target: Python标准库的 re 模块文档中定义的标志列表。每个列表项都应该是一个与人类友好的标志名称相关的字符串。例如， ['IGNORECASE', 'MULTILINE'] 。可选地， flags 可以是一个int，其值对应于所有期望标志的XOR（ | ）。默认为 8 （等于 ['MULTILINE'] ）。

trans-unit.source: A list of functions to be compared against, looking into the fun field from the event data. This option helps to select the events generated by one or more functions. If an event does not have the fun field in the data section, it will be published. For a better selection, consider using the tags option. By default, this option accepts any event to be submitted to Logstash.
trans-unit.target: 要进行比较的功能列表，从事件数据中查找 fun 字段。此选项有助于选择一个或多个函数生成的事件。如果事件在数据部分中没有 fun 字段，那么它将被发布。为了更好的选择，请考虑使用 tags 选项。默认情况下，此选项接受任何要提交给Logstash的事件。

trans-unit.source: A list of sources can also be passed in to provide a default source and a set of fallbacks. The first source in the list that is found to exist will be used and subsequent entries in the list will be ignored. trans-unit.source: A regular expression used to find the lines that are to be commented; this pattern will be wrapped in parenthesis and will move any preceding/trailing ^ or $ characters outside the parenthesis (e.g., the pattern ^foo$ will be rewritten as ^(foo)$) Note that you _need_ the leading ^, otherwise each time you run highstate, another comment char will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 用于查找要注释的行的正则表达式；此模式将包装在括号中，并将任何在前/尾随的 ^ 或 $ 字符移到括号之外（例如，模式 ^foo$ 将被重写为 ^(foo)$ ）。请注意，您需要_need_前导^，否则每次您在高状态下运行，将插入另一个注释字符。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression used to find the lines that are to be uncommented. This regex should not include the comment character. A leading ^ character will be stripped for convenience (for easily switching between comment() and uncomment()). trans-unit.source: A unique string that identifies the request and that allows create_hosted_zone() calls to be retried without the risk of executing the operation twice. It can take several minutes for the change to replicate globally, and change from PENDING to INSYNC status. Thus it's best to provide some value for this where possible, since duplicate calls while the first is in PENDING status will be accepted and can lead to multiple copies of the zone being created. On the other hand, if a zone is created with a given caller_ref, then deleted, a second attempt to create a zone with the same caller_ref will fail until that caller_ref is flushed from the Route53 system, which can take upwards of 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: 一个唯一的字符串,用于标识该请求,并允许重试create_hosted_zone()调用,而不会有执行两次操作的风险。它可能需要几分钟的时间才能在全局范围内复制变化,并从PENDING变为INSYNC状态。因此,最好在可能的情况下为此提供一些值,因为在第一次处于 PENDING 状态时的重复调用将被接受,并可能导致创建区的多个副本。另一方面,如果用给定的 caller_ref 创建了一个区段,然后又被删除,那么第二次尝试用相同的 caller_ref 创建区段时将会失败,直到该 caller_ref 从 Route53 系统中清除为止,这可能需要 24 小时以上的时间。

trans-unit.source: A unique string that identifies the request and that allows create_hosted_zone() calls to be retried without the risk of executing the operation twice. This helps ensure idempotency across state calls, but can cause issues if a zone is deleted and then an attempt is made to recreate it with the same CallerReference. If not provided, a unique UUID will be generated at each state run, which can potentially lead to duplicate zones being created if the state is run again while the previous zone creation is still in PENDING status (which can occasionally take several minutes to clear). Maximum length of 128.
trans-unit.target: 一个唯一的字符串,用于标识请求,并允许重新尝试create_hosted_zone()调用,而不会有执行两次操作的风险。这有助于确保状态调用之间的幂等性,但如果删除了一个zone,然后试图使用相同的CallerReference重新创建它,则会导致问题。如果没有提供,则在每次状态运行时都会生成一个唯一的 UUID,如果在上一次创建的区段仍处于 PENDING 状态时再次运行状态,则可能会导致重复创建区段(有时可能需要几分钟才能清除)。最大长度为128。

trans-unit.source: A unique string that identifies the request and that allows create_hosted_zone() calls to be retried without the risk of executing the operation twice. This helps ensure idempotency across state calls, but can cause issues if a zone is deleted and then an attempt is made to recreate it with the same caller_ref. If not provided, a unique UUID will be generated at each state run, which avoids the risk of the above (transient) error. This option is generally not needed. Maximum length of 128.
trans-unit.target: 一个唯一的字符串,用于标识请求,并允许重试create_hosted_zone()调用,而不会有执行两次操作的风险。这有助于确保状态调用之间的幂等性,但如果一个zone被删除,然后试图用相同的caller_ref重新创建它,则会引起问题。如果不提供,则会在每次状态运行时生成一个唯一的 UUID,这样可以避免上述(瞬时)错误的风险。这个选项一般不需要。最大长度为128。

trans-unit.source: A unique string that identifies the request and that allows create_hosted_zone() calls to be retried without the risk of executing the operation twice. This is a required parameter when creating new Hosted Zones. Maximum length of 128.
trans-unit.target: 一个唯一的字符串,用于识别请求,并允许重新调用create_hosted_zone(),以避免执行两次操作的风险。当创建新的托管区时,这是一个必要的参数。最大长度为128。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, names declarations cannot be used with this feature because the way they are compiled into low states make it impossible to guarantee the order in which they will be executed. This is also checked by the renderer. As a workaround for not being able to use names, you can achieve the same effect, by generate your states with the template engine available within your sls file.
trans-unit.target: 此外， names 声明不能与该功能一起使用，因为名称声明被编译成低状态的方式使得无法保证它们执行的顺序。渲染器也对此进行检查。作为无法使用 names 的解决方法，您可以通过使用sls文件中可用的模板引擎生成状态来达到相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the use_grain option can be set to True. This allows the use of an instance-id grain instead of the minion-id. Since this is a potential security risk, the configuration can be further expanded to include a list of minions that are trusted to only allow the alternate id of the instances to specific hosts. There is no glob matching at this time.
trans-unit.target: 另外， use_grain 选项可以设置为 True 。这允许使用实例ID谷物代替Minion ID。由于这是潜在的安全风险，因此可以将配置进一步扩展为包括可信任的奴才列表，该奴才列表仅允许将实例的备用ID分配给特定主机。目前没有glob匹配。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the default user for these states is root. Therefore, if the cron job is for another user, it is necessary to specify that user with the user parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此外，这些状态的默认用户是 root 。因此，如果cron作业是针对另一个用户的，则需要使用 user 参数指定该用户。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the temporal parameters (minute, hour, etc.) can be randomized by using random instead of using a specific value. For example, by using the random keyword in the minute parameter of a cron state, the same cron job can be pushed to hundreds or thousands of hosts, and they would each use a randomly-generated minute. This can be helpful when the cron job accesses a network resource, and it is not desirable for all hosts to run the job concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 另外，可以通过使用 random 而不是使用特定值来将时间参数（分钟，小时等）随机化。例如，通过在cron状态的 minute 参数中使用 random 关键字，可以将同一cron作业推送到成百上千个主机，并且每个主机都将使用随机生成的分钟。当cron作业访问网络资源时，这可能会有所帮助，并且并非所有主机都希望同时运行该作业。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, two more options must be specified in the top-level configuration in order to use the etcd returner:
trans-unit.target: 此外,为了使用etcd返回器,还必须在顶层配置中指定两个选项。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, while git_pillar allows for the branch/tag to be overridden (see here), keep in mind that the top file must reference the actual environment name. It is common practice to make the environment in a git_pillar top file match the branch/tag name, but when remapping, the environment of course no longer matches the branch/tag, and the top file needs to be adjusted accordingly. When expected Pillar values configured in git_pillar are missing, this is a common misconfiguration that may be to blame, and is a good first step in troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: 另外，虽然git_pillar允许覆盖分支/标签（请参阅此处），但请记住，顶层文件必须引用实际的环境名称。通常的做法是使git_pillar顶层文件中的环境与分支/标记名称匹配，但是，当重新映射时，环境当然不再与分支/标记匹配，并且需要对顶层文件进行相应的调整。如果缺少在git_pillar中配置的期望的Pillar值，这可能是常见的错误配置，这是进行故障排除的第一步。

trans-unit.source: An optional list of dictionaries representing valid FrontendIPConfiguration objects. A frontend IP configuration can be either private (using private IP address and subnet parameters) or public (using a reference to a public IP address object). Valid parameters are:
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的字典列表,代表有效的前端IPConfiguration对象。前端IP配置可以是私有的(使用私有的IP地址和子网参数),也可以是公共的(使用对公共IP地址对象的引用)。有效的参数有

trans-unit.source: An optional list of dictionaries representing valid InboundNatPool objects. They define an external port range for inbound NAT to a single backend port on NICs associated with a load balancer. Inbound NAT rules are created automatically for each NIC associated with the Load Balancer using an external port from this range. Defining an Inbound NAT pool on your Load Balancer is mutually exclusive with defining inbound NAT rules. Inbound NAT pools are referenced from virtual machine scale sets. NICs that are associated with individual virtual machines cannot reference an inbound NAT pool. They have to reference individual inbound NAT rules. Valid parameters are:
trans-unit.target: 代表有效 InboundNatPool 对象的可选字典列表。它们定义了一个外部端口范围,用于在与负载平衡器关联的 NIC 上向单个后端端口进行入站 NAT。使用该范围中的外部端口为与负载平衡器关联的每个 NIC 自动创建入站 NAT 规则。在负载均衡器上定义入站NAT池与定义入站NAT规则是相互排斥的。入站 NAT 池可从虚拟机规模集中引用。与单个虚拟机相关联的 NIC 不能引用入站 NAT 池,必须引用单个入站 NAT 池。它们必须引用单个入站 NAT 规则。有效的参数有

trans-unit.source: An optional list of dictionaries representing valid InboundNatRule objects. Defining inbound NAT rules on your load balancer is mutually exclusive with defining an inbound NAT pool. Inbound NAT pools are referenced from virtual machine scale sets. NICs that are associated with individual virtual machines cannot reference an Inbound NAT pool. They have to reference individual inbound NAT rules. Valid parameters are:
trans-unit.target: 代表有效 InboundNatRule 对象的可选字典列表。在负载平衡器上定义入站NAT规则与定义入站NAT池是相互排斥的。入站 NAT 池从虚拟机规模集引用。与单个虚拟机关联的 NIC 不能引用入站 NAT 池。它们必须引用单个入站 NAT 规则。有效的参数有

trans-unit.source: An unquoted empty string is not valid JSON, but it's very normal for the Powershell output to be exactly that. Therefore, we do not attempt to parse empty Powershell output (which would result in an exception). Instead we treat this as a special case and one of two things will happen:
trans-unit.target: 未加引号的空字符串不是有效的JSON,但Powershell的输出正是如此,这非常正常。因此,我们不会尝试解析空的Powershell输出(这将导致一个异常)。相反,我们将此作为一种特殊情况处理,两种情况之一将发生。
